text: tatha (vah samay yaad karo) jab aapake paalanahaar ne aadam ke putron kee peethon se unakee santati ko nikaala aur unhen svayan unapar saakshee (gavaah) banaate hue kahaah kya main tumhaara paalanahaar nahin hoon? sabane kahaah kyon nahin? ham (isake) saakshee[1] hain; taaki pralay ke din ye na kaho ki ham to isase asoochit the
